'''Lagenaria Chapter''' is the [[Story Quest]] chapter for [[Baizhu]].

==List of Acts==
* Act I - [[The Heart of Healing]]
** Requirements: {{Quest|40;1;A New Star Approaches;Yet the Butterfly Flutters Away;Butterfly's Dream|display=bullet|requirements=1}}

==Summary==
===Act I - The Heart of Healing===
{{Main|The Heart of Healing}}
{{Description|The arrival of unexpected guests and news from old acquaintances have disturbed the usual peace of Bubu Pharmacy.<br>Every reunion is destined to end in farewell, even unto death. Such is a fate that all mortals face, scattered like mere dust.<br>The boundary between medicine and poison seems to have blurred, as has the line between life and death... Where can one find a truly perfect remedy, or does it exist at all?}}
{{Transclude|The Heart of Healing|Summary}}
